data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chavtur, Vladimir G., Keyser, Dietmar A., Bashmanov, Alexander G. (2015): Morphology and distribution of pelagic ostracods of the genus Boroecia (Ostracoda: Halocyprididae) in the Central Arctic. Zootaxa 4013 (3): 151-194, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4013.2.1
